channel.title: Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on Anqi (Angie) Liu

item.description: I am an Assistant Professor in the CS department at the Whiting School of Engineering of the Johns Hopkins University. My research interest lies in machine learning for trustworthy AI. I am broadly interested in developing principled machine learning algorithms for building more reliable, trustworthy, and human-compatible AI systems in the real world. This requires the machine learning algorithms to be robust to the changing data and environments, to provide accurate and honest uncertainty estimates, and to consider human preferences and values in the interaction.
